title: free chocolate and hazelnut spread
description: This recipe is for all you chocolate spread lovers out there. It's sugar-free and super simple to make, what more could you want?A portion of this spread provides 88 kcal, 2g protein, 1g carbohydrate (of which 0.5g sugars), 8.5g fat (of which 0.5g saturates), 1g fibre and 0g salt.
